page.title: 14Shopping 2
page.content: The Spar shop sells all kinds of foods including sweets and meat. It is also a Post Office and acts as a Giro Bank. There are two postal collections from the village each day, but only one delivery of letters and postal packets. The post is delivered by Post ladies who make their deliveries on bicycles. The Post Office bicycles have a large metal carrier over the front wheel for the post bag. The other General Store is called Yates'. A few years ago it was called Pollards' and before that it was Kirmans'.There are old photographs of this shop on file at Grimsby Library. Yates shop sells food etc. and it also sells clothes and tea towels.
